com.shipdream.lib.poke

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shipdream.lib.poke.Component

  • public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    A component can provide providers by methods annotated by Provides.

    Note that: By default, provide methods annotated by Singleton will be singleton in the scope of the component. For example, if ComponentA#ProvidesObjectX() is annotated by Singleton, every time ComponentA#ProvidesObjectX() is called, it provides the same instance cached by its getScopeCache(). In other words the methods annotated by Singleton could be relative singleton to this component if the component has it's stand alone scope cache. Otherwise provide a custom scope cache to control how to generate new instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Component()
      Constructor with a stand alone scope cache used only by this component
      Component(ScopeCache scopeCache)
      Constructor with the given scope cache.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScopeCache getScopeCache()
      The scope cache that all providers registered by Provides with Singleton will share.
